name: Sunflower Hallows
description:
Escape the darkness and seek shelter by the sunflowers.

Don't stay in the dark for too long in this exploration of the Game Jam theme of CottageCore meets Dark CottageCore. A game that plays with contrasting visuals and seeking fleeting safety in a Grim(m) environment.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left-Click - Shooting
  • Space - Jumping

A game developed by indie game startup CinderCat Games during a 48-hour game jam using Unreal Engine 4.
